name: One Last Shot: Post Jam
description:
OLS: Post Jam build.

One Last shot is a survival shooter game where you play as Ava, a country girl. at least that's what it seemed like until different creatures started showing up on her farm one evening but good thing she has some guns laying around.

Every creature is different, and have only one weakness. Ava knows that well, but Each weapon she picks coincidentally have only one shot left, Enemies are powerful and can easily kill her, she must make her every shot count by switching the elemental State of, whats remaining, for her advantage against each enemy. how she does that? who knows.

if she doesn't remember how to kill an enemy, she can always check her reliable journal for answers!

Controls:

WASD - Move.  Mouse: aim and shoot. Right click: Dash. 

1,2 and 3 key for changing elemental state to fire, ice and magic, respectively.

Checkout Original jam version here.

Credits:

Fully Programmed and designed by: Arcaid.

Art by: Didi, Ara and MJ.

Music and sounds by: salex_r3ktand MJ.
